required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: the Effect of Different Oxaliplatin Dose in Transarterial Infusion (TAI) in Unresectable Hepatocellular Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: the Effect of Different Oxaliplatin Dose in Transarterial Infusion (TAI) in Unresectable Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: evaluate the effect of different oxaliplatin dose in TAI in treating unresectable HCC.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of death from any cause, assessed up to 60 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of death from any cause, assessed up to 60 months
From date of randomization until the date of progress from any cause, assessed up to 60 months
